sentence.text: Doyle chuckled then left her to serve a customer .
He chuckled quietly and set off towards the feeding animals .
The wino chuckled silently .
Cassie hissed , and Johnny chuckled appreciatively .
He chuckled inwardly , thinking that maybe the boy was not altogether lost to him .
Chuckling wickedly , he thrust them into his waistcoat pocket , collected the lamp from the desk top , and quietly departed the room .
Bessie chuckled and waved her hand at him in a dismissing gesture .
Nancy chuckled and , now that he was outside in the daylight , in the open air , it seemed almost ridiculous to himself .
She chuckled as if the idea was highly amusing .
I chuckled with pleasure .
The handsome old man chuckled in childish vanity .
He chuckled at the recollection .
He lay back on his thick pile of cushions and chuckled .
Reid saw me examining the Eusol -- an antiseptic used since the turn of the century -- and chuckled .
He beamed and chuckled .
All the other children had laughed , chuckled , and wanted to be loved , admired , praised , on reaching this moment of achievement .
Harry Pascoe chuckled , and stoked the underside of his beard .
The old man chuckled , an oddly disturbing sound in the dark and dusty crypt .
Morgan chuckled , a wheezing sound .
She whisked out , chuckling .
But even as she chuckled , Phoebe knew now that this was not fair .
